page.title: 18A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I get up between 7 and 8 o'clock.I have cereals and some toast and I drink tea and sometimes orange juice.I go to School by car.School starts at 9 o'clock.In the morning I watch breakfast television.When there is no School I play in the garden with my brother.There are squash courts at Toft and I play there.At lunch I have sandwiches,cakes and biscuits.If we are at School you have to take your own sandwiches and drink.I sometimes make my Mum and Dad a cup of tea.My Dad comes home about 7 o'clock onwards.My Dad is a plumber.In the winter my Dad is sometimes kept late because of burst pipes.In the holidays I have some friends over.I play football with them.At night I usually feed the cats.I went to see a test match between England and Australia.I went with my Dad.
